tossup_question: 12) EARTH AND SPACE  When spreading centers reach above the ocean’s surface, they typically form which of the following types of volcanoes:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) shield 
X) composite 
Y) stratovolcano 
Z) cinder cone
bonus_question: 12) EARTH AND SPACE  Mount Vesuvius in Italy is a typical:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) mud volcano 
X) caldera 
Y) cinder cone 
Z) composite volcano
